main.name: Yiqian (Olivia) Wang
main.bio: Skilled in Python, machine learning and full-stack development. Active member in voluntary work and amateur artist in campus publications. Eager learner in novel computer technology, and dreams of creating beautiful software products for humanity. Columbia master student in Computer Engineering, with undergraduate degree in Electrical Engineering.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

testimonials.text: Yiqian thrives at finding solutions and collaborating. At the National Laboratory of Pattern Recognition, she determined how to apply the Generative Adversarial Network to her code, overcoming the lack of machine learning courses at her university. She decided to further her education at Columbia University, where she works toward a master’s degree in Computer Engineering. As a student, she led a four-person team to build an Alpha Gomoku Game, solving disagreements and finding the best solution in limited time. She is an encouraging and diligent team player. Her ability to problem-solve and cooperate will enable her to succeed in the future.
